title: Eight Ball
desc:
Post 840
If played, one of the following effects will happen at random.
1. You discard a card.
2. You draw two cards.
3. All players except you draw a card.
4. You and a random player get linked, then you discard a card.
5. You are destroyed and all evidence of your existence is erased.
6. You instantly discard or draw till you have one card in your hand.
7. You get a random <:weapon:1107519313075785768> card and a random Module, and then play that weapon.
8. You instantly play the card 118, Special Event.
9. You draw a random card from posts 50-70.
10. You discard two random cards.
Alternatively, you can play this card without an ability.
